Key Match Events: India barely broke a sweat in a thumping seven-wicket win over Bangladesh
Varun Chakaravarthy made his comeback to the national side after three years and took three wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The packed house at the Shrimant Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium, hosting its first international match
Others: Sanju Samson, Suryakumar Yadav and Hardik Pandya wreaked havoc in the chase
Hardik Pandya finished the match in style with a huge six over midwicket
Debutant Nitish Kumar Reddy enjoyed the show from the other end, finishing unbeaten on 16
